attributes.action: Exempt Covid19 vaccinated UK residents from Amber & Red countries travel rules
attributes.additional_details: Please consider amending travel rules to exempt those who received the two doses of Covid19 vaccine.
attributes.background: UK residents who received two doses of Covid19 vaccine are safe by default. They should not be subject to travel restrictions, including self isolation and the too many requested PCR tests. They should be treated differently in view of the available scientific evidence.
